websites.description: This website! Frontend is made with React. Backend with Node.js and Express. Deployed to zeit.co. Click the lightbulb to change the theme. Source code available on GitHub.
websites.name: Personal Website (2019)

websites.description: Shopping list app/website, that learns from what you write, and autocompletes it next time you add it. API is built with Kotlin, app/website is build with Vue.js. Auto deployment via Travis CI. Backend and database hosted on Heroku, and frontend is hosted on Netlify.
websites.name: Shopping List (2019)

websites.description: Info screen for popular cryptocurrencies. Written in nodejs and express, using pug as templating language. Using the cryptocompare api.
websites.name: crypto_info (2017)

websites.description: Website for a bed-and-kitchen in Esbjerg. Most pages are server-side-rendered using PHP and Laravel, though some components like the calendar, and the owner's dashboard, are made using Vue.js. The website features a calendar booking system, that integrates with Airbnb.
websites.name: Overnatning i Esbjerg (2014-2019)
